song.songtext:
<Label:1> Je tam brána zdobe[D]ná, cestu oteví[Emi]rá, zahradu zele[C]nou [G]všechno připomí[D]ná. Jako dým závo[D]jů mlhou upřede[Emi]ných, vstupuješ do ti[C]cha [G]cestou vyvole[D]ných.
<Label:2> Je to březový [D]háj, je to borový [Emi]les, je to anglický [C]park, [G]je to hluboký [D]vřes. Je to samota [D]dnů, kdy jsi pomalu [Emi]zrál, v zahradě zel[C]ený, [G]kde sis za dětství [D]hrál.
<Label: 3> Kolik chceš, tolik [D]máš očí otevře[Emi]ných, tam venku za bra[C]nou [G]leží studený [D]sníh. Zpočátku usly[D]šíš vítr a ptačí [Emi]hlas, v zahradě zel[C]ený [G]přijdou do ticha [D]zas
<Label: 4> Světlo připomí[D]ná rána slunečných [Emi]dnů v zahradě zel[C]ený [G]v zahradě beze [D]snů. Uprostřed závra[D]tí sluncem prosvíce[Emi]ným, vstupuješ do ti[C]cha [G]cestou vyvole[D]ných.

<Label>1</Label> [Emi]Peklo byl ráj, když hořela stáj,[Ami7]příteli, [C]věř mi, koně [D]pláčou, poví[G]dám. [H7] [Emi]To byla půlnoc, vtom křik o pomoc, už [Ami7]letěly [C]hejna kohoutů[D] a bůhví [G]kam[H7].
<Label>Ref</Label> [G]Zachraňte koně, [Hmi]křičel jsem tisíc[C]krát, [G]žil jsem jen pro ně, [Hmi]bránil je nejvíc[C]krát, než přišla [Ami]chvíle, kdy hřívy [C]bílé pročesal [Ami]plamen, spálil na [H7]troud.
<Label>2</Label> Ohrady a stáj a v plamenech byl kraj, už nedýchal, já viděl, jak to hříbě umírá. Klisna u něj a smuteční děj se odbývá, jak tiše pláče oči přivírá.

<Label>1</Label> [D]Pořád mi ři[C]káš, že si [G]zamilova[D]ná [C] [G] potom se mě ptáš, jestli jsem i já, na to ti odpovídám, že jsem taky rád sám, pojď se nadechnout, z plnejch plic se mnou. [A]
<Label>Ref</Label> [D]Dobrý a časy zlý, [G]se mění jak počasí [D]a venku po setmění, [G]kobry zuby cení, [D]se asi čerti žení, [G]hoří ti vlasy [D]a do toho ty hlasy. [G]
<Label>2</Label> Do slova do písmene, už ani nedoufáš, až se probudíš, že bys byla nevinná, kdo to leží vedle tebe, no to nebudu jen já, nejsem zamilovanej, ty jsi zamilovaná.

song.songtext:
[Emi] Zatan [G] či, má milá, [D] zatanči [Emi] pro mé oči, zatan [G] či a vetkni [D] nůž do mých [Emi] zad, ať tvůj [G] šat, má milá, [D] ať tvůj šat [Emi] na zemi skončí, ať tvůj [G] šat, má milá, [D] rázem je s [Emi] ňat.
Ref. [Emi] Zatan [G] či, jako se [D] okolo [Emi] ohně tančí, zatan [G] či jako [D] na vodě [Emi] loď, zatan [G] či jako to [D] slunce mezi [Emi] pomeranči, zatan [G] či, a [D] pak ke mně [Emi] pojď.
[Emi] Polož [G] dlaň, má milá, [D] polož dlaň na má [Emi] prsa, polož [G] dlaň nestoudně [D] na moji [Emi] hruď, obej [G] mi, má milá, [D] obejmi moje [Emi] bedra, obej [G] mi je pevně [D] a mojí [Emi] buď.
Ref. [Emi] Zatan [G] či….
[Emi] Nový den [G] než začne, [D] má milá, nežli [Emi] začne, nový den [G] než začne [D], nasyť můj [Emi] hlad, zatan [G] či, má milá, [D] pro moje oči [Emi] lačné, zatan [G] či a já [D] budu ti [Emi] hrát.

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> V zátoce [C]naší je [F]celej den [C]stín, dneska je [Ami]tichá, [F]já dobře [C]vím, kdy ten stín [Ami]zmizí [F]i z duše mo[C]jí, za vodou [F]čekám [G]na lásku svo[C]ji.
<Label>2</Label> Poslední dříví jsem na oheň dal, i kdyby nocí překrásně hřál, já nespím, to víš, jak bych si přál, proč si mě Hondy na práci vzal?
<Label>3</Label> Pomalu svítá a krávy jdou pít, v sedle zas musím celej den být, proč má tvůj tatík, ach, tolika stád, tejden už sháním a nemůžu spát
<Label>4</Label> Zítra se vrátím na jižní díl, v zátoce naší, tam bude můj cíl, vítr se zdvihá a měsíc je blíž, zítra stín zmizí, dobře to víš.

song.title: Zátoka

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> [G]To bylo v [G7]Dakotě [C]po vejplatě, [G]whisky sem tam pašo [D7]val, A [G]že sem [G7]byl sám jako [C]kůl v plotě [C]([G]), s holkou sem ta [D7]m špáso [G]val.
<Label>2</Label> [G]Šel sem s ní v [G7]noci, kde [C]vede stezka [G]vokolo červenejch sk[D7]al, [G]než sem jí st[G7]ačil říct [C]že je hezká [G], zpěněnej [D7]býk se k nám hn[G]al.
<Label>Ref</Label> Povídám, [C]jupí, čerte, [G]jdi radši dál, pak jsem ho ze rohy vz[D7]al. ( a zahodil ) Udě[G]lal pře[G7]met a ja[C]ko tur řv[G]al, do dáli upa[D7]loval[G].
<Label>3</Label> To bylo v Dawsonu, tam v saloonu, a já jsem zase přebral. ( jako vždycky) Všechny sví prachy sem měl v talónu, na život jsem nadával.
<Label>4</Label> Zatracenej život, čert by ho spral, do nebe sem se rouhal. Než jsem se u báru vzpamatoval, Belzebub vedle mě stál.
<Label>Ref</Label>
<Label>5</Label> Jó, rychle oplácí tenhleten svět, než bys napočítal pět, (šest) ďáblovým kaňonem musel sem jet, když sem se vracel nazpět.
<Label>6</Label> Jak se tak kolíbám, uzdu v pěsti, schylovalo se k dešti, Belzebub s partou stál v prostřed cesty, zavětřil jsem neštěstí.
<Label>Ref</Label>

song.title: Zatracenej život

song.songtext:
[G] [D] [Ami] [C] [Emi] [D] [A] [A] <Label>1</Label> [G]Smutnej déšť a [D]město v kouři, [Ami]ticho prázdnejch [C]rán. [Emi]Noční můry [D]pijou silnej [A]čaj.

<Label>Ref</Label> [G]Znám tě mnohem [D]víc, země [Ami]vzdálená, [C] [Emi]spát s taje[D]mnou záv[A]ratí. [A]
<Label>3</Label> Roky ztratí sílu, když ti dál šeptám: While my guitar gently weeps.
<Label>4</Label> Pod správnou hvězdou v malým ráji chtěl jsem říct: Still my guitar gently weeps.
[F]Den chová stín v [C]záclonách, [G]toulavej pár [D]koček, strach, [F]sen ti skrývá na [C]víčkách, že jsi [G]mou.
Bláznům se jen může smát, když nám ráno dává mat.
[F]chtěl jsem dál jen [C]poslouchat, [D]že jsi mou, [E]že jsi mou.

song.songtext:
<Note2:Originál Emi>
<Label>1</Label> Až mě [Ami]zítra ráno v pět, [C]ke zdi posta[C7]ví, Ješ[F]tě si napos[G]led dám [C]vodku na [Ami]zdraví, z očí [Dmi]pásku strhnu [G]si, to abych [C]viděl na [Ami]nebe a [Dmi]pak vzpomenu [E]si, má [Ami]lásko, na tebe na [Dmi]na [G]na [C] [Ami] …. a [Dmi]pak vzpomenu [E]si na [Ami]tebe.
<Label>2</Label> Až zítra ráno v pět přijde ke mně kněz, řeknu mu, že se splet', že mně se nechce do nebes, že žil jsem, jak jsem žil, a stejně tak i dožiju a co jsem si nadrobil, to si i vypiju, a co jsem si nadrobil, si i vypiju.
<Label>3</Label> Až zítra ráno v pět poručík řekne:"Pal!", škoda bude těch let, kdy jsem tě nelíbal, ještě slunci zamávám, a potom líto přijde mi, že tě, lásko, nechávám, samotnou tady na zemi, že tě, lásko, nechávám, na zemi.
<Label>4</Label> Až zítra ráno v pět prádlo půjdeš prát a seno obracet, já u zdi budu stát, tak přilož na oheň a smutek v sobě skryj, prosím, nezapomeň, nezapomeň a žij, Lásko, nezapomeň a žij...

song.title: Zítra ráno v pět

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> [G]Zrození hvězd čas [C]vykřesá kvapem a [Emi]můžou mě vézt, až [Hmi]vyryju drápem staré [C]medvědice do [Emi]skály větrů [D]tvůj obličej.
<Label>2</Label> Kraj otěhotněl jak prvnička v máji tou padlou tmou a někde ve stáji se splaší koně a přiklušou blíž, ke mně blíž.
<Label>Ref</Label> A [C]březí klisna má oči jako ty a [Emi]sedlo z ně[D]hy, možná [C]se jí stýská, možná je zraněná a [Emi]možná je [D]ty, všechno [C]možná, všechno možná bude lepší než [G]dřív. [C][Emi][D]
<Label>3</Label> Tahleta létavice mně do uší zpívá píseň panice, co z tváře ti slíbá tvůj vodopád slz a měsíční prach, co ty víš.
<Label>4</Label> Kraj Indiánů mě úsvitem vítá a ranní déšť mou rytinu smývá, jsi vzdálená víc, co můžu ti říct, můžu říct, jen to.

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> [D]Už vyplouvá loď John B., už vyplouvá loď John B., okamžik malý, jen než popluje v [A7]dál, nechte mě [D]plout[D7], nechte mě [G]plo-o-[Gmi]out, [D]sil už málo mám[A7] tak nechte mě [D]plout.
<Label>2</Label> Nejdřív jsem se napil, na zdraví všem připil, vím, že cesta má konec už má, nechte mě plout, nechte mě plout, sil už málo mám, tak nechte mě plout.
<Label>3</Label> Sklenici svou dopil, zakrátko u mne byl, okovy na mne dal a pistole vzal, šerif John Stone, šerif John Stone, moji svobodu vzal šerif John Stone.
<Label>4</Label> Už vyplouvá loď John B., už vyplouvá loď John B., okamžik malý, jen než popluje v dál, nechte mě plout, nechte mě plout, sil už málo mám, tak nechte mě plout.
song.author: Jiří Rangers
song.title: Zvedněte kotvy

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> [A]Za mořem [E]nejhlubším za [D]horou vyso[E]kou, [A]za lesem [E]smutnějším než [D]oči dětí [E]jsou. Křídla [D]vran tisíc [E]bran devět [D]řek vede [E]tam, poslou[A]chej.
<Label>2</Label> Za bránou tisící tam zvonková je zem a lidé zvonkoví v ní zvoní celý den. Pro váš pláč, pro váš smích, ring-o-ding pro váš hřích, poslouchej.
<Label>3</Label> A lidé zvonkoví ve zvoncích zrození, když se stane neštěstí, svým zvonkem zazvoní ring-o-ding, ring-o-ding, ring-o-ding, ring-o-ding. Poslouchej ...
<Label>4</Label> Přichází i mezi nás, i mezi námi jsou, na první pohled je nepoznáš, když po ulici jdou, zazvoní, když přijde čas, kde by mlčky stál každý z nás. Poslouchej ...
<Label>5</Label> Až jednou vyrostou, pak jistě zazvoní, mí lidé zvonkoví ve zvoncích zrození Pro váš pláč, pro váš smích, ring-o-ding pro váš hřích, poslouchej.

song.title: Zvonkoví lidé

song.songtext:
[G] Život je jen [C7] náhoda, [G] jednou si dole, jednou [G7] nahoře, [C] život plyne, [Cmi] jak voda a [G] smrt je [D7] jako mo [G] ře. [D7] Každý k moři dopluje, někdo dříve a někdo později, kdo v životě miluje, ať neztrácí naději. [G7]

[G] Že je život [C7] jak voda, [G] kterou láska ve víno [G7] promění, [C] láska že je [Cmi] náhoda a [G] bez ní [D7] štěstí ne [G] ní. [G7]

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> Když [C]kapky deště buší na [Fmaj7]rozpále[G]nou [C]zem, já toužím celou duší dát [Fmaj7]živou vodu [C]všem, už v knize knih je psáno: bez [Fmaj7]vody [G]nelze [C]žít, však ne každému je dáno a [Fmaj7]z řeky pravdy [C]pít.
<Label>Ref</Label> Já mám ží[G]zeň, věčnou ž[C]ízeň[C7], stačí [Fmaj7]říct, kde najdu vlá[C]hu a zchladím [Fmaj7]žáhu [C]páliv[G]ou, já mám ží[G]zeň, věčnou ž[C]ízeň[C7], stačí [Fmaj7]říct, kde najdu vlá[C]hu, a zmizí ží[Fmaj7]ze[C]ň, ží[Fmaj7]ze[C]ň.
<Label>2</Label> Stokrát víc než slova hladká jeden čin znamená, však musíš zadní vrátka nechat zavřená, mně čistá voda schází, mně chybí její třpyt, vždyť z moře lží a frází se voda nedá pít.
<Label>Ref</Label> Já mám žízeň...
<Label>3</Label> Jak vytékají říčky zpod úbočí hor, tak pod očními víčky já ukrývám svůj vzdor, ten pramen vody živé má v sobě každý z nás a vytryskne jak gejzír, až přijde jeho čas.
<Label>Ref</Label> Já mám žízeň... 2x
song.author: Spirituál Kvintet
song.title: Žízeň

[Verse 1] Em C D Em I was twenty-four years old when I met the woman I would call my own Em C G C D Em Twenty-two grand kids now growing old in that house that your brother bought ya Em C D Em On the summer day when I proposed, I made that wedding ring from dentist gold Em C G C D Em And I asked her father but her daddy said no, you can't marry my daughter
[Chorus 1] G C G D C G She and I went on the run, don't care about religion G C G C D Em I'm gonna marry the woman I love, down by the Wexford border G C G D C G She was Nancy Mulligan, and I was William Sheeran G C G C D Em She took my name and then we were one, down by the Wexford border
Em C D Em Em C G C D Em
[Verse 2] Em C D Em Well I met her at Guy's in the second world war and she was working on a soldier's ward Em C G C D Em Never had I seen such beauty before the moment that I saw her Em C D Em Nancy was my yellow rose and we got married wearing borrowed clothes Em C G C D Em We got eight children now growing old, five sons and three daughters
[Chorus 2] G C G D C G She and I went on the run, don't care about religion G C G C D Em I'm gonna marry the woman I love, down by the Wexford border G C G D C G She was Nancy Mulligan, and I was William Sheeran G C G C D Em She took my name and then we were one, down by the Wexford border
[Interlude] G C D Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, da da G C D G Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di G C D Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, da da G C D G Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di
[Verse 3] Em C D Em From her snow white streak in her jet black hair, over sixty years I've been loving her Em C G C D Em Now we're sat by the fire in our old armchairs, you know Nancy I adore ya Em C D Em From a farm boy born near Belfast town, I never worried about the king and crown Em C G C D Em 'Cause I found my heart upon the southern ground, there's no difference I assure ya
[Chorus 3] G C G D C G She and I went on the run, don't care about religion G C G C D Em I'm gonna marry the woman I love, down by the Wexford border G C G D C G She was Nancy Mulligan, and I was William Sheeran G C G C D Em She took my name and then we were one, down by the Wexford border
[Outro] G C D Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, da da G C D G Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di G C D Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, da da G C D G Di da-da-da-da-da di-da-di, di da-da-da-da-da di

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> [Ami]Šel pocestný kol [G]hospodských [Ami]zdí, [C]přisedl k nám a [G]lokálem [C]zní [Dmi]pozdrav jak svaté [Ami]přikázá[G]ní: [Ami]Omnia [G]vincit [Ami]Amor.
<Label>2</Label> Hej, šenkýři, dej plný džbán, ať chasa ví, kdo k stolu je zván, se mnou ať zpívá, kdo za své vzal Omnia vincit Amor.
<Label>Ref</Label> Zlaťák pálí, nesleví nic, štěstí v lásce znamená víc, všechny pány ať vezme ďas! Omnia vincit Amor
<Label>3</Label> Já viděl zemi válkou se chvět, musel se bít a nenávidět, v plamenech pálit prosby a pláč - Omnia vincit Amor.
<Label>4</Label> Zlý trubky troubí, vítězí zášť, nad lidskou láskou roztáhli plášť, vtom kdosi krví napsal ten vzkaz: Omnia vincit Amor.
<Label>Ref</Label> Zlaťák pálí, nesleví nic, štěstí v lásce znamená víc, všechny pány ať vezme ďas! Omnia vincit Amor
<Label>5</Label> Já prošel každou z nejdelších cest, všude se ptal, co značí ta zvěst, až řekl moudrý: "Pochopíš sám, všechno přemáhá láska."
<Label>Ref</Label> Zlaťák pálí, nesleví nic, štěstí v lásce znamená víc, všechny pány ať vezme ďas! Omnia vincit Amor
<Label>6</Label> Teď s novou vírou obcházím svět, má hlava zšedla pod tíhou let, každého zdravím tou větou všech vět: Omnia vincit Amor. Omnia vincit Amor...
song.author: Klíč
song.title: Omnia vincit amor

<Label>1</Label> Cht[Ami]ěl jsem jí jednou jen "lásko má" ř[G]íci, a ona na to:"Jean, tak vyměň tu sv[Ami]íci," chřadnu, vadnu, l[C]áska je h[G]ořká jak bl[C]ín, a ona:"Hl[G]avně v[Emi]yciď ten c[Ami]ín," povězte mi, př[C]átelé, kd[G]o tohle může sn[C]ést, teď jdu venčit ps[G]a, a p[Emi]ak musím:

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> Š[Emi]ejdíři s kapsami plnými zl[D]ata zm[C]izeli z očí jak větrný pr[Emi]ach, d[G]ěti se brodily nánosem bl[D]áta, [Ami]od domu k domu jen z[G]avřená vr[D]ata zv[H7]ěstují bezmezný strach.
<Label>2</Label> Žoldáci zahráli na struny víry, víno a hostii vzal každý rád, kolem se šířil jen ostrý pach síry a jako výsměch teď za zvuků lyry výstřely určují řád.
<Label>3</Label> Pochválen král, který do davu hodí pár hrstí měďáků - utichne řev, ve zlatých palácích sláva se rodí, za slávou mocných jak temný stín chodí zrada a závist a hněv. [Ami] [G]
<Label>4</Label> Pochválen král, který do davu hodí p[F]ár hrstí měďáků - utichne ř[Ami]ev, v[C]e zlatých palácích sláva se r[G]odí, z[Dmi]a slávou mocných jak t[C]emný stín ch[G]odí zr[E7]ada a závist a hněv.

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> Hodím návnadu [C]ps[C4]ům, [C]a om[F]ámím st[G]ráže, [Emi]pak se proplížím [Ami]tmou, p[F]řes tři ná[G]dvoří. Ty mi podáš svůj klíč, a propustíš páže, a na křídlech sov, přelétnem pohoří
<Label>Ref</Label> Budeš na skále [C]st[C4]át [C], já [F]budu ta sk[G]ála, budeš třešňový [Ami]sad, na [F]mém úb[G]očí. Tam si stvoříme stát, a tam kde jsi stála, já postavím tvrz, ať si útočí.
<Label>2</Label> Budou chtít naši krev, budou chtít naše kosti, půjdou přes štíty hor, přes pět údolí. Bude znít jejich řev, jejich běsnění zlosti, ať skosí nás mor, ať se lvi zápolí.
<Label>Ref</Label> Budeš na skále...
Jak spráskaní psi, odtáhnou domů, čistí se vzduch, nasáklý ocelí. Já jsem a ty jsi, dvě koruny stromů, kde byl ukován šíp, který nás rozdělí.
<Label:Out> [G]Budeš na skále [C][C4][C][F][G][Ami][F][G] [C][C4][C][F][G][F][G] [G]Hodím návnadu [C]ps[C4]ům, [C]a om[F]ámím str[G]áže. [C]

song.songtext:
<Label>1</Label> B[G]ěží krajem dl[Hmi]ouhá cesta, d[C]o svatého m[D]ěsta tě zavede, p[G]odél cesty kř[Hmi]íže s těly, s t[C]ěly těch, co n[D]euspěli, v[C]ae [Emi]vict[D]is, [G]am[D]en,[C] a[D]me[G]n.
<Label>2</Label> Tisíce se zvedly v právu, neměly nic a slávu si dobyly, ponížený zvedá hlavu, veden vírou vlastní síly, vae victis, amen, amen.
<Label>3</Label> Plamen vzpoury letí státem, otroci pouť volnou si zvolili, otrokář však platí zlatem, římská vojska valem sílí, vae victis, amen, amen.
<Label>4</Label> Marné bylo odhodlání, jiskra žití sklání se před silou, umírali za svítání, pod nohama cestu bílou, vae victis, amen, amen.

Ami C G Já oslí kuklu mám, k mým rolničkám patří smích, F E Ami a smích slyším všude znít, jak procházím světem tím, C světem, který rád tak se chválí sám, G F E Ami že jen k bláznům mám důvěru jít.
R: C G Drápy skal, bytosti bez duší, Ami E svět přízraků, mlčení moruší, F C v ovzduší kouzel, čar zahlédnu pokaždé ten tvar, E Ami E Ami svůj vlastní škleb, zrcadla střep, kejklířův zmar.
Ami C G Pár frašek umím hrát, a k oslavám patří žert F E Ami a čert je má figura, ta nestvůra, kterou dám C rozhřešení vám - vrahům, nevěstkám, G F E Ami úspěch mám a svět je, jak má být.
Ami C G Dmi Bůh ví, že mám už s maskou srostlou tvář, věru mám, Ami C stín v duši, věčný strach, vždyť i ve fraškách, G F E Ami co mám rád, se vás začínám bát.

<Label:Verse 1> Well, g[Ami]rey clouds wrapped round the [Fmaj7]town like elastic C[G]ars stood like toys made of T[C]aiwanese p[C/H]lastic The [Ami]boy laughed at the spastic d[Fmaj7]ancing around in the [G]rain [Gadd4] [G] While l[Ami]aundrettes cleaned clothes, high [Fmaj7]heels rub toes P[G]uddles splashed huddles of [C]bus stop [C/H]crows Dr[Ami]essed in their suits and their [Fmaj7]boots, well they all look the [G]same
<Label:Bridge 1> I t[F]ook myself down to the c[G]afe to find all the [C]boys lost in [C/H]books and cr[Ami]ackling [G]vinyl And c[F]arved out a poem a[G]bove the urinal that r[C]ead [C7]
<Label:Chorus> Don't you cr[F]y for the lost, s[G]mile for the living G[C]et what you [C/H]need and give [Ami]what you're given [G] L[F]ife's for the living so l[G]ive it Or you're better off d[Ami]ead

<Label:Verse 2> While the [Ami]evening pulled the moon [Fmaj7]out of its packet St[G]ars shone like buttons on an [C]old man's j[C/H]acket We n[Ami]eeded a nail but we t[Fmaj7]acked it till it fell off the w[G]all While p[Ami]igeons pecked drains, sp[Fmaj7]arks flew like planes The r[G]ain showed the rainbows in the [C]oil stai[C/H]ns And we [Ami]all had new iPhones but n[Fmaj7]o one had no one to c[G]all
<Label:Bridge 2> And [F]I stumbled down to the s[G]tomach of the town Where the w[C]idow takes m[C/H]emories to slo[Ami]wly drown [G] With a h[F]and to the sky and a m[G]ist in her eye she s[C]aid [C7]

<Label:Bridge 3> Till then [F]I'll make my bed from a d[G]isused car With a m[C]attress of l[C/H]eaves and a bl[Ami]anket of stars [G] And I'll st[F]itch the words into my h[G]eart with a needle and thr[C]ead [C7]

I hate [C]ignorant folks, who pay m[F]oney to see gigs, And [G]talk through every fucking [C]song. I hate [Ami]people in nightclubs, [F]snorting coke, And [C]explaining where you're going [G]wrong. Well, [Ami]if you agree, come [F]hate it with me, And [G]feel free to sing [C]along.

We [C]pretend to be friend[F]s on the internet, Yet [G]when in real life we have noth[C]ing to say, Oh, [Ami]brother, I've love for [F]my mother, For [C]good times, for mus[G]ic and for my mates. Ye[Ami]ah, I love and I live, and[F] I have love to give, But [G]sometimes, all you [C]can do is hate.

And I [Ami]hate queuing up for festival toilets, [F]Especially when you need a [C]shit. I [Ami]hate the X-factor, for [F]murdering music, You [G]bunch of money grabbing [C]pricks.

Just [C]grow old with grace, have you [F]seen Cher's face? It [G]looks like it's been hit by a [C]truck.

song.songtext:
<Label:Verse 1> Of [Ami]all the trees that grow so fair, old England to adorn, [Fmaj7]Greater are none beneath the sun than [G]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn.
<Label:Chorus Strum Once> Sing [Ami]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn, good sirs, All on a midsummer's [Emi]morn. [Fmaj7]Surely we sing of no little thing In [G]Oak, and Ash, and [Ami]Thorn.
<Label:Verse 2> [Ami]Yew that is old, in churchyard mould, he breedeth a mighty bow [Fmaj7]Alder for shoes do wise men choose, and [G]Beech for cups also But [Ami]when you have killed, and your bowl it is filled, and your shoes are clean outworn [Fmaj7]Back you must speed for all that you need to Oak, and [G]Ash, and Thorn
<Label:Chorus> |: Sing Oak, and Ash, and Thorn... :|
<Label:Verse 3> Elm, she hates mankind and waits, til every gust be laid, To drop a limb on the head of him that anyway trusts her shade, But whether a lad be sober or sad, or mellow with ale from the horn, He'll take no wrong when he lyeth along 'neath Oak, and Ash, and Thorn
<Label:Chorus> Sing Oak, and Ash, and Thorn... Sing [Ami]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn, good sirs, [Ami]All on a midsummer's morn. [Emi] [Fmaj7]Surely we sing of no little thing In [G]Oak, and Ash, and Thorn. [Ami] [Ami] [Ami]
<Label:Verse 4> Oh, do not tell the priest our plight, for he would call it a sin, (A SIN!) But we've been out in the woods all night, a-conjuring summer in, We bring you good news by word of mouth, good news for cattle and corn Sure as the sun come up from the south, by Oak, and Ash, and Thorn. [D] [D] [D]
<Label>Chorus</Label> Sing Oak, and Ash, and Thorn x4
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Oak & Ash & Thorn

song.songtext:
<Label:Verse 1> [D]Fresh out of college, with g[G]rades straight from [D]Hell I [D]browsed for a trade at which [A]I could excel [D]An ad for a ship in [G]need of some [D]manning [D]Men, sails, and purpose, but [A]lacking a [D]captain
<Label:Verse 2> [G]What luck, says I, to [D]find such good fortune! A [A]few white lies later, I [D]ran down the pier [G]Bought me a coat and a [D]cutlass or two [A]Jumped on the deck, and I yelled at the crew:
<Label:Chorus> [G]Hoist up the thing! [D]Batten down the whatsit! [A]What's that thing spinning? [D]Somebody should stop it! [G]Turn hard to port! (That's not port) [D]Now I've got it! [A]Trust me, I'm in cont[D]rol!
<Label:Verse 3> I [D]can't sing the shanties, it [G]has to be [D]said And [D]all of that grog just goes [A]right to my head [D]Whale meat is gross and [G]I miss a girl's [D]laugh [D]Five weeks at sea, even [A]Dave seems a catch!
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Verse 4> [D]We've hit icy waters, no [G]land to be [D]seen [D]The food's getting low and the [A]beer has gone green There's [B]murmurs of discontent [Gmi]under the deck If I [F]don't act fast, it [A]could be my neck!
<Label:Verse 5> So [D]pull up the charts and those [G]weird gold mac[D]hines I [D]see what it says but no [A]clue what it means! Just [D]pull on some levers and [G]yank on some [D]chains [D]Feign a bad back 'til we've [A]landed again
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Chorus> Hoist up the thing!...
<Label:Out> [G]Hoist up the thing! [D]Batten down the whatsit! [A]What's that thing spinning? Some[D]body should stop it! (BLOODY HELL!) [G]Turn hard to port! (This is SHERRY!) [D]Now I've got it! (Screaming) [A]Trust me, I'm [G]in con[D]trol! (MOMMY) [A]Trust me, I'm in con[D]trol!
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Hoist up the thing

song.songtext:
<Label:Verse 1> The [Dmi]Diamond is a [C]ship, me lads, for the [Dmi]Davis Strait we're [Ami]bound, the [Dmi]quay it is all [Ami]garnished with [F]bonny l[C]asses 'r[Dmi]ound; Captain [Dmi]Thompson gives the [C]orders to [Dmi]sail the ocean [Ami]wide, Where the [Dmi]sun it never [Ami]sets, me lads, nor [F]darkness [C]dims the [Dmi]sky
<Label:Chorus> For it's [Dmi]cheer up me lads, let your [F]hearts never fail, For the [C]bonny ship, the Diamond, goes a-f[G]ishing for the whale. For it's [Dmi]cheer up me lads, let your [F]hearts never fail, For the [G]bonny ship, the Diamond, goes a-f[G]ishing f[F]or the w[Dmi]hale. [Dmi][C][Dmi][Ami] [Dmi][Ami][F][C] [Dmi]
<Label:Verse 2> A[Dmi]long the quay of [Ami]Peterhead, the [Dmi]lasses stand [Ami]around, Wi' [Dmi]shawls all pulled a[Ami]round them and the [F]salt tears [C]runnin' [Dmi]down; Well [Dmi]don't you weep, my [Ami]bonny lass, though y[Dmi]ou'll be left beh[Ami]ind, For the [Dmi]rose will bloom on [Ami]Greenland's ice be[F]fore we [C]change our [Dmi]mind
<Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads...
<Label:Verse 3> Here's a [Dmi]health to the Reso[Ami]lution, like[Dmi]wise the Eliza [Ami]Swan, Three [Dmi]cheers to the Battler [Ami]of Montrose and the [F]Diamond, [C]ship of [Dmi]fame; We [Dmi]wear the trousers [Ami]of the white and [Dmi]jackets of the [Ami]blue, When [Dmi]we get back to [Ami]Peterhead, we'll [F]have sweet[C]hearts a[Dmi]new,
<Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads...
<Label:Verse 4> It [Dmi]will be bright both [Ami]day and night when [Dmi]Greenland lads come [Ami]hame, Our [Dmi]ship full up with [Ami]oil, my lads, and [F]money [C]to our [D]name; We'll [Dmi]make the cradles [Ami]for to rock and the [Dmi]blankets for to [Ami]tear, And [Dmi]every lass in [Ami]Peterhead sing: "[F]Husha[C]bye, my [Dmi]dear"
<Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads... <Label: Chorus> For it's cheer up me lads...
<Label:Outro> [Dmi][Ami][F][G] [Dmi][Ami][G][C] [Dmi]
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Bonny ship the diamond

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 4> <Label:Verse 1> [Ami]Watch that old [C]fire as it [G]flickers and [Ami]dies That [C]once blessed the h[G]ousehold and [D]lit up our lives It s[C]hone for the f[D]riends and the c[Ami]linking of g[G]lasses I'll [Ami]tend to the [C]flame; you can [G]worship the a[Ami]shes
<Label:Verse 2> Capture the wild things and bring them in line And own what was never your right to confine The lives and the loves and the songs are what matters I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
<Label:Verse 3> Do you feel heavy? Your eyes drop with grief Your spirit is wild and your suffering is brief So never you buckle and bend to the masses I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
<Label:Verse 4> Get round the fire with a glass of strong ale And tell us a story from beyond the pale Bury some seeds and expect some strong branches I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
<Label:Verse 5> Now show me a man that can meet all his needs For what we need most now is unity's seed: A common old song for all creeds and all classes I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes I'll [Ami]tend to the flame [E]...
<Label:Verse 6> What will we do when the world it is ending And time it is halted for friend and for foe? Try to hold on to the time as it passes I'll [Ami]tend to the [C]flame; you can [G]worship the a[Ami]shes I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes I'll tend to the flame; you can worship the ashes
song.author: The Longest Johns
song.title: Ashes

<Label:Verse 1> [G]Well I am the [G]boy who cried wolf And [C]I know I've lied in the [C]past But [Dadd4]last night I saw his [C]yellow eyes shining in the dark [G] [G]Yeah I know I spun [G]tales with this voice And I [C]opened my mouth too [C]fast But [Dadd4]last night I saw his [C]footprints in the path[G]
<Label:Chorus 1> Well, [Dadd4]I could swim every [C]sea, from south pole to [G]north But [Dadd4]I know I'll only ever [C]be the boy who cried [G]wolf
<Label:Verse 2> [G]Well I am the [G]shepherd's only son [C]And I know what a [C]joke I've become I've an [Dadd4]honest heart but I've [Dadd4]lies on my tongue I don't [G]know how it started or [G]where it came from And [G]you have no reason and [G]I have no proof But [C]this time I swear I'm [C]telling the truth I [Dadd4]saw that old wolf from [Dadd4]tail to tooth And I [G]know that he's hungry, and he's [G]coming down too
<Label:Chorus 2> Well, [Dadd4]I could swim every [C]sea from south pole to [G]north And [Dadd4]I could climb every [C]tree, scale every [G]course And [Dadd4]I could tell only the [C]truth from this day [Emi]forth[G/F#][G] But [C]I know I'll ever [Dadd4]be the boy who cried [G]wolf
<Label:Outro> Oh-[C]oh I [Dadd4]am the boy who cried [G]wolf Oh-oh-oh-[C]oh I [Dadd4]am the boy who cried...[G]

song.songtext:
[Intro]
C F G Dm7
[Verse]
C If you love somebody F Better tell them while they're here cause G Dm7 They just may run away from you
C You'll never know what went well F Then again it just depends on G Dm7 How long of time is left for you
C I've had the highest mountains F I've had the deepest rivers G Dm7 You can have it all but life keeps moving
Am G Now take it in but don't look down
[Chorus]
F Cause I'm on top of the world ay C I'm on top of the world ay G Waiting on this for a while now Dm7 Paying my dues to the dirt F I've been waiting to smile ay C Been holding it in for a while ay G Take it with me if I can Dm7 Been dreaming of this since a child C I'm on top of the world
[Verse 2]
C I've tried to cut these corners F Try to take the easy way out G Dm7 I kept on falling short of something
C I coulda gave up then but F Then again I couldn't have cause G Dm7 I've traveled all this way for something
Am G Now take it in but don't look down
[Chorus]
F Cause I'm on top of the world ay C I'm on top of the world ay G Waiting on this for a while now Dm7 Paying my dues to the dirt F I've been waiting to smile ay C Been holding it in for a while ay G Take it with me if I can Dm7 Been dreaming of this since a child C I'm on top of the world
F Cause I'm on top of the world ay C I'm on top of the world ay G Waiting on this for a while now Dm7 Paying my dues to the dirt F I've been waiting to smile ay C Been holding it in for a while ay G Take it with me if I can Dm7 Been dreaming of this since a child
[Bridge]
F And I know it's hard when you're falling down C And it's a long way up when you hit the ground G Dm7 Get up now, get up, get up now.
F And I know it's hard when you're falling down C And it's a long way up when you hit the ground G Dm7 Get up now, get up, get up now.
[Chorus]
F Cause I'm on top of the world ay C I'm on top of the world ay G Waiting on this for a while now Dm7 Paying my dues to the dirt F I've been waiting to smile ay C Been holding it in for a while ay G Take it with me if I can Dm7 Been dreaming of this since a child C I'm on top of the world

song.songtext:
[Chorus] Am Em I know that one day I'll be that one G Thing that makes you happy D I know I'll keep you laughin' Am Your sun on a clouded day Em The feel of a perfect wave G Is crashin' upon your face D Yeah, I know that one day, one day
[Verse 1] Am Em Birds out-side, will sing me a song tonight G D I know that it's right on time, time
Twee-da-da-da Am Em Life flies by the moon and the midnight sky G D Is guiding me to your side, side
[Chorus] Am Em I know that one day I'll be that one G Thing that makes you happy D I know I'll keep you laughin' Am Your sun on a clouded day Em The feel of a perfect wave G Is crashin' upon your face D Yeah, I know that one day, one day
[Verse 2] Am Em Can we run away to a place G D That children play in the grassy fields?
Twee-da-da-da Am I know they're tellin' you things Em That you put in your head, head G D Promise you that you are better off without them
[Chorus] Am Em I know that one day I'll be that one G Thing that makes you happy D I know I'll keep you laughin' Am Your sun on a clouded day Em The feel of a perfect wave G Is crashin' upon your face D Yeah, I know that one day, one day Am Em One day I'll be that one (One, one, one) G Thing that makes you happy D I know I'll keep you laughin' Am Your sun on a clouded day (One, one, one) Em The feel of a perfect wave G Is crashin' upon your face D Yeah, I know that one day, one day

song.ID: They Don't Know You Like I Do
song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 2>
[Intro] G D Am C G D Hum, dum-dum-dum, dum-dum Am C Hum-dum, hum-dum, dum
[Verse 1] G He was never gonna make it G Every pill he'd find, he'd take it D Always on the edge of breakdowns D Keepin' it together somehow Am Just another cold November Am You called me but I didn't answer C I was so oblivious C Now, I'm askin' for forgiveness G For every single time I failed you G I'm feelin' like it's me that killed you D Rememberin' the time they jumped you D And I was too scared to help you Am Looking back, I can't erase it Am Guess it's time to face it C You never seemed to know how to let it all go
[Chorus] G D Am C G Don't listen to a single word they say about you D Am C They don't know you like I do G D Am C G Don't listen to a single word they say about you D Am C They don't know you like I do
[Verse 2] G Everybody saw you smilin' G That you were always good at hiding D You were always asking questions so you wouldn't draw attention Am Everyone who used you Am They never really knew you C Always showin' up for everybody but yourself G See, I wish I could take it back G Change the future and erase the past D Grab the bullet out and put him back D I promise that I'd save your life like you saved mine Am But now it's far too late for that Am C And all I have is your story left to tell C So, let me tell it G Let me tell
[Chorus] D Am C G Don't listen to a single word they say about you D Am C They don't know you like I do G D Am C G Don't listen to a single word they say about you D Am C They don't know you like I do
[Outro] G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da G D Am C G Da, da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da, da-da-da-da

song.songtext:
[Intro] E
[Verse 1] E Do you feel the same when I'm away from you? A Do you know the line that I'd walk for you? B We could turn around, or we could give it up A A But we'll take what comes, take what comes E Oh the storm is raging against us now A If you're afraid of falling then don't look down B But we took the step, and we took the leap A A And we'll take what comes, take what comes
[Pre-Chorus] C#m Feel the wind in your hair B Feel the rush way up here
[Chorus] E We're walking the wire, love A We're walking the wire, love C#m We're gonna be higher, up B We're walking the wire, wire, wire
[Verse 2] E There's nights we had to just walk away A And there's tears we'll cry, but those tears will fade B It's the price we pay when it comes to love A A And we'll take what comes, take what comes
[Pre-Chorus] C#m Feel the wind in your hair B Feel the rush way up here
[Chorus] E We're walking the wire, love A We're walking the wire, love C#m We're gonna be higher, up B We're walking the wire, wire, wire
[Bridge] E So look out down below A Look out down below C#m Look out down below B Walking the wire, wire, wire E So look out down below
[Verse 3] E Oh, I'll take your hand when thunder roars A And I'll hold you close, I'll stay the course B I promise you from up above A A That we'll take what comes, take what comes, love
[Chorus] E We're walking the wire, love A We're walking the wire, love C#m We're gonna be higher, up B We're walking the wire, wire, wire
[Outro] E So look out down below A Look out down below C#m Look out down below B Walking the wire, wire, wire E So look out down below
E A C#m B

song.songtext:
<Note1:Capo 3>
[Intro] Am C G F
[Verse 1] Am C Days pass by and my eyes stay dry and I think that I'm okay G F 'Til I find myself in conversation fading away Am The way you smile, the way you walk C G The time you took to teach me all that you had taught F Tell me, how am I supposed to move on?
[Pre-Chorus] Am C These days I'm becoming everything that I hate G Wishing you were around, but now it's too late N.C. My mind is a place that I can't escape your ghost Am C G Sometimes I wish that I could wish it all away F One more rainy day without you Am C G Sometimes I wish that I could see you one more day F One more rainy day
[Chorus] Am C Oh, I'm a wreck without you here G F Yeah, I'm a wreck since you've been gone Am C I've tried to put this all behind me G F I think I was wrecked all along Am Yeah, I'm a wreck
[Verse 2] Am C They say that the time will heal and the pain will go away G F But everything, it reminds me of you and it comes in waves Am The way you laugh when your shoulders shook C G The time you took to teach me all that you had taught F Tell me, how am I supposed to move on?
[Pre-Chorus] Am C These days I'm becoming everything that I hate G Wishing you were around, but now it's too late N.C. My mind is a place that I can't escape your ghost Am C G Sometimes I wish that I could wish it all away F One more rainy day without you Am C G Sometimes I wish that I could see you one more day F One more rainy day
[Chorus] Am C Oh, I'm a wreck without you here G F Yeah, I'm a wreck since you've been gone Am C I've tried to put this all behind me G F I think I was wrecked all along
[Bridge] Am C These days when I'm on the brink of the edge G I remember the words that you said F "Remember the life you led" Am C You'd say, "Oh, suck it all up, don't get stuck in the mud G Thinking of things that you should have done" F Am C G I'll see you again, my loved one F I'll see you again, my loved one Am C G Yeah, I'm a wreck F I'll see you again, my loved one
[Chorus] Am C Oh, I'm a wreck without you here
(I'm a wreck without you here, loved one) G F Yeah, I'm a wreck since you been gone
(I'm a wreck since you've been gone) Am C I've tried to put this all behind me G F I think I was wrecked all along (I'm a wreck) Am Yeah, I'm a wreck
[Outro] Am C G Sometimes I wish that I could wish it all away (But I can't) F One more rainy day without you (One more rainy day) Am C G Sometimes I wish that I could see you one more day (But I can't) F One more rainy day
